pilots.name: Boba Fett
pilots.caption: Notorious Bounty Hunter
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each enemy ship at range 0-1.

pilots.name: Kath Scarlet
pilots.caption: Captain of the Binayre Pirates
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if there is at least 1 friendly non-limited ship at range 0 of the defender, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Koshka Frost
pilots.caption: Icy Professional
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform and attack, if the enemy ship is stressed, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

pilots.name: Krassis Trelix
pilots.caption: Imperial Deserter
pilots.ability: You can perform [Front] special attacks from your [Rear]. While you perform a special attack, you may reroll 1 attack die.
